about_the_game:
Dive into the enchanting realm of Hentai Senpai: Thicc Fairies of Forest Lake! Immerse yourself in the captivating Forest Lake where tantalizing puzzles await, each adorned with alluring Thicc Fairies ready to mesmerize you at every turn.

🧩 Puzzle Adventure:

  • Challenge your mind with two captivating puzzle styles: Swapping and Rotating! Strategize cleverly to uncover the secrets of these enchanting Thicc Fairies!

🌿 Meet the Forest Nymphs:

  • Unlock the mystical allure of 26 captivating Thicc Fairies, each radiating with natural charm and ethereal beauty!

🖼️ Fairy Gallery:

  • Delve into the mesmerizing charm of the Thicc Fairies effortlessly. Lose yourself in the allure of each Thicc Fairy through an intuitive gallery interface.

❤️ Favorites Collection:

  • Select your most cherished Thicc Fairies for quick access and succumb to their magical allure!

🎨 Immersive Art Style:

  • Explore the vibrant world of Forest Lake with breathtaking 5K visuals. Let the magical and alluring Thicc Fairies enchant your senses!

🎵 Enchanting Melodies:

  • Immerse yourself in enchanting melodies that capture the essence of the Forest Lake. Let the music guide your journey through this magical realm!

⚙️ Personalized Settings:

  • Customize your gaming experience to fit your preferences. Adjust settings such as resolution, fullscreen mode, and framerate to fully immerse yourself in the enchanting world of the Thicc Fairies.



Embark on a mystical journey through the captivating universe of Hentai Senpai: Thicc Fairies of Forest Lake, where your wit and strategy in solving puzzles reveal the beauty and charm of these magical creatures.

All characters depicted are magical creatures (18+).

content_descriptors.notes:
Hentai Senpai: Thicc Fairies of Forest Lake contains graphic sexual content including nudity, genitalia & bodily fluids. Any and all sexual acts contain consenting adult characters. The setting is secluded forest with a lake where thicc fairies live!
All characters are adults (18+).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required for sweet fairy tunes
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Will more than likely work on requirements less than this.
